motions.title: Move Dunwoody Nature Center Item to Consent Agenda
motions.description: Motion to move item #15 (Dunwoody Nature Center Matching Funding Agreement Extension) to the consent agenda.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • November 25, 2024 meeting minutes • Additional funding authorization for 1480 Old Spring House Lane stormwater repairs • Funding authorization for stormwater repairs at 1398 Womack Road • 2025 athletic agreements for Rush Union, MABL, and school user groups • ESRI renewal for GIS mapping application suite • Migration of police applications to Central Square Cloud • Dunwoody Nature Center matching funding agreement extension

motions.title: Discover Dunwoody 2025 Budget Approval
motions.description: Approval of the Discover Dunwoody 2025 proposed budget.

motions.title: Contract Amendment for Peeler Road Path Design
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment with Practical Design Partners for the Peeler Road path design.

motions.title: Capital Project Closeout and Funding Reallocation
motions.description: Approval of capital project closeout and reallocation of funding.

motions.title: Text Amendment to Chapter 6 (Second Read)
motions.description: Second read approval of text amendment to Chapter 6 to restrict unlicensed sale of dogs, cats, or domestic rabbits.

motions.title: City of Civility Resolution
motions.description: Approval of City of Civility resolution.

motions.title: 2025 Athletic Agreements for Senior Baseball and Softball
motions.description: Approval of 2025 Athletic Agreements for Dunwoody Senior Baseball and Dunwoody High School Softball Booster Club.

publicHearings.title: RZ 24-02: Mount Vernon Road and Jett Ferry Road Rezoning (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of rezoning request for 2480, 2526 Mount Vernon Road & 2495 Jett Ferry Road from NS (Neighborhood Shopping) to C-1 (Local Commercial). Planning Commission unanimously recommended approval.
publicHearings.publicSupport: Multiple speakers in favor, one opposed

discussionItems.title: Chamblee Dunwoody Bridge Enhancement Design Update
discussionItems.description: Update on bridge enhancement design integrating Dunwoody's logo, expanding sidewalk to 14 feet, and adding lighting.

discussionItems.title: 2025 Georgia General Assembly Legislative Session
discussionItems.description: Preview of legislative issues with breakfast meeting planned with three legislators in January.

notes: Mayor Deutsch participated via Zoom from her office for part of the meeting
Significant public comment support for Mount Vernon/Jett Ferry rezoning
